attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
To instruct all local authoritys.To end the bad practice of recording disability related illness and sickness as the same thing as they do at the moment
As at present they use this as a tool to end the employment of disabled people
which is unfair and unjust.

rejection.details: "We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to Instruct All Local Councils." does not make sense. The title of the petition must be easy for people to know what the petition is about and therefore whether to click on it.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
